User.title: User Profile
User.description: Represents a user's public profile information, created upon first login.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user account was created.

Budget.title: Budget
Budget.description: Represents a single budget, which can be personal or shared.

ownerId.description: The UID of the user who owns and created the budget.

members.description: An array of user UIDs who have read/write access to this budget. Includes the owner by default.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the budget was created.

Transaction.title: Transaction
Transaction.description: Represents a single financial transaction within a budget.

date.description: The date and time of the transaction.

note.description: An optional note for the transaction.

authorId.description: The UID of the user who created the transaction. Must be one of the budget's members.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public user profile data, keyed by user UID. A user can only read/write their own document.

/budgets/{budgetId}.description: Main collection for all budgets. Security rules will enforce that only users whose UID is in the 'members' array can read/write.

/budgets/{budgetId}/transactions/{transa.description: Sub-collection for transactions within a specific budget. Access is inherited from the parent budget; only budget members can read/write transactions.
